name: Shield of Thorns
description:
In Shield of Thorns, you play as a person wielding the Shield of Thorns allowing you to go through enemies but also to shoot them. Waves of enemies will arrive such as the winged minion kaiju (so it's not really a kaiju) that chases you but goes away when you have the shield, a thorny health pack which if you hit using the shield from below, you can get it's health, a laser minion kaiju (also not really a kaiju) and the long necked (real) kaiju. For you to win, just attack as much winged minion kaiju until the long necked kaiju comes then attack him 3 times to win. You also can do triple jumps when you throw your shield.

Controls: Left and Right Arrow Keys to Move, Down to Throw the Shield and to Triple Jump when not Holding It

Credits:

Miyaki: Programmer, Artist, SFX Artist

Takago: Music Artist
